# functions

**Instance Property**

An array of function objects to link to the new function.

## Declaration

```swift
var functions: [any MTLFunction]? { get set }
```

## Specifying related functions

- **binaryFunctions**: An array of function objects already compiled to a binary representation to link.
- **groups**: An optional list of groups specifying which functions your shader can call at each call site.
- **privateFunctions**: An array of function objects to link to the new function, without exporting the functions publicly.
